value.name: Woman involved in high speed chase through state lines sentenced to prison
value.description: A woman is going to prison, for her part in a high speed chase that took officers across state lines. On September 15th of 2020, Joshua Johnson and Danae Hernandez led Denison police on a chase through town.

value.name: Ret. NYPD detective on police reform
value.description: May 25th marks one year since George Floyd was murdered by former Minneapolis officer Derek Chauvin. The George Floyd Justice in Policing Act is currently stalled in the Senate undergoing bipartisan negotiations.

video.name: Ret. NYPD detective on police reform

value.name: NYC Pride bans police from parade
value.description: New York's Pride organizers announced uniformed NYPD officers are no longer welcome at the event. Pride is asking the police to stay at least one block away and acknowledge the “harm" law enforcement has done to the LGBTQ+ community.

video.name: NYC Pride bans police from parade

value.description: there is no police footage of the incident. A grand jury has decided not to indict Tu Tran, a Harris County Sheriff's Office deputy who shot and killed Joshua Johnson, a 35-year-old Black man ...

value.name: This singer’s daughter is only 8, see how her rap on race got national attention
value.description: Canyons School District second grader India Boyé answers the question posed by a PTA contest why she matters with award-winning rap about her biracial family

value.name: Grand jury will not indict undercover deputy who shot and killed house-sitting Missouri City man
value.description: According to the Harris County District Attorney's Office, the grand jury no-billed the undercover deputy who shot and killed 35-year-old Joshua Johnson. The deputy has been identified as Tu Tran.

value.name: Canyons District second grader's rap song on her biracial family wins national honors in PTA Reflections contest
value.description: In a matter of 25 seconds, 8-year-old India Boyé can tell you about her biracial family and why she matters in a rap that's won hearts and national recognition.

value.name: Grand jury declines to indict HCSO deputy who killed Joshua Johnson
value.description: Joshua Johnson, 35, was killed last April by Tu Tran, a 12-year veteran HCSO deputy working undercover on the Gulf Coast Task Force.
